data.title: Brute Orbits by George Zebrowski: As New Hardcover (2000) 1st Edition, Book Club Edition, Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition, Book Club Edition - Hardcover - The Easton Press - 2000 - Condition: As New - No Jacket - Signed by Author - Single Owner - Unread - Private Collection - Always stored in Dust free bookcases in dry climate - Limited run - Stunning volume with original artwork by Bob Eggleton - Collector's Edition Accented in 22kt gold, printed on archival paper with gilded edges, smyth sewing & concealed muslin joints - Bound In full leather with hubbed spines - Includes pristine bookplate on inside of front cover - Condition: Signed/Pristine/As New/Unread - from the Masterpieces of Science Fiction Collection by The Easton Press - Brute Orbits
data.text:
About this Item

Signed by Author - Single Owner - Unread - Private Collection - Always stored in Dust free bookcases in dry climate - Limited run - Stunning volume with original artwork by Bob Eggleton - Collector's Edition Accented in 22kt gold, printed on archival paper with gilded edges, smyth sewing & concealed muslin joints - Bound In full leather with hubbed spines - Includes pristine bookplate on inside of front cover - Condition: Signed/Pristine/As New/Unread - from the Masterpieces of Science Fiction Collection by The Easton Press. Seller Inventory # 98
